name: CHROMASS
description:
Install instructions

Due to a containment error in a space lab called Nahuw, an alien virus has escaped and completely infested the station. As an agent of CHROMASS, an alien virus disinfection company, you are sent to the station to eliminate this threat by containing all areas.

Your goal:  

Fight the virus by confining it to different areas by capturing beacons and finding them with the help of radar.

Controls 

ZQSD : movements

Mouse : move the camera

Shift : Dash

Space : Jump / Double Jump

E : Activation of tags

Weapon :

R : Reload

Left Click Mouse : Shoot!

Right Click Mouse : Special Shoot !

wheel : change vision glasses

Quick explanations of the enemies: 

Green cubes : Tank

Red Triangles : Damages

Yellow Cones : Speed

Blue Icospheres : Creator of other entities.

All credits goes to : Paul Béziers, Tristan Colombier, Sunny Pautrat, Aurélie Roux
